model

Class DeviceSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • generic.RoverClientRunnable
      • model.DeviceSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DeviceSimulator
extends RoverClientRunnable
    DeviceSimulator is multithread client class that simulates the client thread for server communication
    Author:
    Thermal Group (CS537: California State University, Los Angeles)

    • Debasish Guha: debasish.gt@gmail.com
    • Mahdiye Jamali: mahdiye.jamali@gmail.com
    • Gayatri Devpal: gayatridevpal18@gmail.com
    • Mohammad Yazdani: m.yazdani2010@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CommandData command
      Model class object for storing module/instrument and commands associated by them.
      private Modules id
      Reference id refers to Modules enum object.
      private State state
      Represents the state (ON/OFF) of the module or instrument.
      private ThermalCommands thermalCommand
      Represents the commands that are provided by Thermal module that is being order by other client or module.
      private int toggle 
      private int waitTime 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceSimulator(int port, java.net.InetAddress host, Modules id, int toggle)
      Constructor for defining all the values that is required for creating the DeviceSimulator and assigning all the values to the instance of the DeviceSimulator.

      void shutDown()
      Changes the Status of the DeviceSimulator to OFF after all jobs has been completed successfully on a particular module or device.

      Changes the Status of the DeviceSimulator to ON for starting the job on the device or module

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private Modules id
        Reference id refers to Modules enum object. since every module has a unique name, here is considered to be the unique identifier for identifying the running thread on the network.

      • state

        private State state
        Represents the state (ON/OFF) of the module or instrument. State is Enum data type holding list of Strings

      • thermalCommand

        private ThermalCommands thermalCommand
        Represents the commands that are provided by Thermal module that is being order by other client or module.

      • command

        private CommandData command
        Model class object for storing module/instrument and commands associated by them.

      • waitTime

        private int waitTime

      • toggle

        private int toggle

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public State getState()
        Returns the Stage of the DeviceSimulator Object. State can be String ON/OFF
        Returns:
        Stage

      • setState

        public void setState(State state)
        Sets the Stage of the DeviceSimulator Object. State can be String ON/OFF

      • getId

        public Modules getId()
        Returns the Modules of the DeviceSimulator Object. Modules is Enum data type which is all the modules name of the Rover in form of String.
        Returns:
        Modules

      • setId

        public void setId(Modules id)
        Sets the Modules of the DeviceSimulator Object. Modules is Enum data type which is all the modules name of the Rover in form of String.
        Parameters:
        Modules -

      • getThermalCommand

        public ThermalCommands getThermalCommand()
        Returns the ThermalCommands of the DeviceSimulator object. ThermalCommands is Enum of Strings that is holding all the comrades handled by Thermal module and issued by other module(s)
        Returns:
        ThermalCommands

      • getWaitTime

        public int getWaitTime()
        Returns the waiting time of the DeviceSimulator object. By default waiting is 300 millisecond
        Returns:
        int

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(int waitTime)
        Sets the waiting time of the DeviceSimulator object. By default waiting is 300 millisecond
        Parameters:

        public int getToggle()

      • setToggle

        public void setToggle(int toggle)

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Changes the Status of the DeviceSimulator to OFF after all jobs has been completed successfully on a particular module or device.

      • startUp

        public void startUp()
        Changes the Status of the DeviceSimulator to ON for starting the job on the device or module

      • getRandomThermalCommand

        public ThermalCommands getRandomThermalCommand()
        Returns ThermalCommands object randomly. There are 3 types of ThermalCommands.
        The purpose of this method is to emulate the commands receiving from other module/client
        Returns:
        ThermalCommands String

      • run

        public void run()
        Overriding the run() of the java.lang for multithreading purpose.
        Here is creating ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream for creating new message and passing it to the Server and reading incoming message from the server. The communication are don in String object and formated in JSON.
